text: Alexander's Ragtime Band is a 1938 American musical movie directed by Henry King and was based on the 1911 song of the same name by Irving Berlin. It stars Tyrone Power, Alice Faye, Don Ameche, Ethel Merman, Jack Haley, Helen Westley, John Carradine, Wally Vernon, Ruth Terry, Stanley Andrews and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. It was nominated for 6 Oscars and won an Academy Award in 1939. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1938 musical movies Category:American musical movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Henry King Category:Movies set in San Francisco Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies set in Paris Category:Movies set in London Category:Movies set in the 1910s Category:Movies set in the 1920s Category:Movies set in the 1930s
title: Alexander's Ragtime Band
